```{r}
# 開始設定
gmailAddress <- c(
  "tim@gmail.com",
  "anita",
  "yellen@gmail.com",
  "huang@gmail.com"
)

cat("起始狀況\n")
gmailAddress

# for loop
library(stringr)
for(i in seq_along(gmailAddress)){
  if(!str_detect(gmailAddress[[i]],"@gmail.com")){
    correctGmailAddress <-
      str_c(gmailAddress[[i]],"@gmail.com")
    gmailAddress[[i]] <- correctGmailAddress
  }
}

cat("修正後狀況\n")
gmailAddress
```
